Subject: Meeting Reminder
Body: I’m really excited about our strategy discussion tomorrow!

Subject: Project Update
Body: I’m happy with how the project is progressing. Great job!

Subject: Urgent: Server Issue
Body: I’m afraid the server crashed last night. Please fix ASAP.

Subject: Thank You
Body: I’m grateful for your support during the client meeting. Thank you!

Subject: Follow-up
Body: I trust your judgment on the proposal changes. Let’s proceed.

Subject: Appreciation
Body: I’m pleased with your excellent work on the report.

Subject: Unexpected Issue
Body: I was shocked by the sudden budget cut. Let's discuss.

Subject: Apology
Body: I’m sad we missed the delivery deadline. It won’t happen again.

Subject: Exciting News
Body: I’m looking forward to our product launch next week!

Subject: Concern
Body: I’m worried about the risks in the new vendor deal. We should evaluate further.
